title: Quiz - CurrentTap - ESI - 1st to 7th November 2022
instruction: 9th round of India-Republic of Korea (ROK) Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement (CEPA) up-gradation negotiation has recently (Nov 2022) been held. The two sides underlined the need to have negotiations, which are based on win-win approach, are forward looking and outcome oriented. Both sides shared the hope that the CEPA upgradation negotiations would play an important role in strengthening and deepening economic cooperation between both countries. Subgroups on Trade in Goods, Services, Rules of Origin, Investment, SPS/TBT issues held in-depth discussions.

quiz.text: Which of the following entities has recently (Oct 2022) signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) in Mumbai with FIFA and All India Football Federation for the ‘Football4Schools’ initiative in India.?
options: Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports
Government of Maharashtra
Ministry of Education
NITI Aayog
National Sports Federation of India

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ‘Football for Schools (F4S)’ programme?

A.     It includes a paid digital application and an online learning platform.

B.      Footballs will be distributed in both government and private schools.

C.      USD 50,000 will be paid to each Member Association in installments.
options: A and C
B and C
A and B
B only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Under ‘Football4Schools’ initiative, FIFA plans to reach out to 700 million children worldwide, out of which ____________ are from India.
options: 25 million
5 million
50 million
75 million
100 million

quiz.text: BHAVISHYA Portal is an online Pension Sanction & Payment Tracking System, launched by Department of Pension and Pensioners’ Welfare. It aims to ensure payment of all retirement dues and delivery of Pension Payment Order (PPO) to retiring employees ___________.
options: within 3 months from the day of retirement
within a month from the day of retirement
within 7 days from the day of retirement
within a fortnight from the day of retirement
On the day of retirement itself

quiz.text:
Recently (Nov 2022), a total of 301 young researchers have been selected for support under SERB-National Post-Doctoral Fellowship (N-PDF), to work for 2 years in areas of science and engineering.

Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the fellowship?
options: Research grant of Rs. 2 lakhs for two years are provided during the fellowship.
Fellows can work on five thematic areas of research.
Candidates applying for fellowship should have maximum age of 35 years.
Fellowship was initiated in 2015.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Technology Development Board has signed an agreement to provide a loan of _____________ for the development and Commercialization of Saliva Direct Sample Collection Kit.
options: Rs. 9 crores
Rs. 7 crores
Rs. 4 crores
Rs. 12 crores
Rs. 10 crores

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), a first-ever training program for Traditional/ Herbal Products in India has been organized by which of the following organizations?
options: World Health Organization – South East Asia Regional Office
Pharmacopoeia Commission for Indian Medicine & Homoeopathy
National Institute of Ayurveda
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: WHO South East Asia Regional Office is one of the _______ WHO regions.
options: four
six
five
seven
nine

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the government has constituted a 7-member expert panel/ committee to prepare a National Drugs database to strengthen the monitoring mechanism for quality drugs and create a uniform regulatory mechanism. The panel is expected to submit the recommendations in what time?
options: three months
six months
twelve months
eighteen months
nine months

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Ministry of Education has created a high-level panel to strengthen the assessment and accreditation of higher educational institutions. Who among the following is the chairperson of the panel?
options: A K Pradhan
Dr Pooja Gupta
K Radhakrishnan
BT Khanapure
K Kasturirangan

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Government of ___________ & U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) has launched Trees Outside Forests in India (TOFI) programme.
options: Assam
Punjab
Rajasthan
Sikkim
Haryana

quiz.text:
Recently (Nov 2022), the Hyderabad based Megha Engineering and infrastructure limited (MEIL) has bagged a project to build Mongolia’s first Greenfield Oil Refinery.

Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the project?

A.     It is a part of an Initiative of India’s Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas.

B.      Engineers India Limited is the project management consultant for the project.

C.      MEIL would provide EPC at a cost of $790 million.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Apparel Export Promotion Council (AEPC) has launched Apparel Industry Sustainability Action (AISA) 2022–2023. Which of the following is/are the objectives of the AISA 2022-23?
options: Encouraging wider penetration of sustainability measures amongst MSMEs
Hand holding of MSMEs with demonstrations and solutions
Enhancing the brand visibility of sustainable companies on a global platform
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the 10th session of the India-Kyrgyz Republic Inter-Governmental Commission on Trade, Economic, Scientific and Technological Cooperation (IKIGC) has been organized. Diplomatic relations between India and Kyrgyzstan were established in which of the following years?
options: 1992
2012
2008
1997
2004

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), 15th Urban Mobility India (UMI) conference & expo 2022 has been organized in Kochi, Kerala. Which of the following was the theme of the conference?
options: Azadi@75 – Sustainable Aatma Nirbhar Urban Mobility
Mobility for All
Emerging Trends in Urban Mobility
Smart Mobility
Accessible and Livable Cities

quiz.text: As per the details shared at the conference, what is India’s rank in the world in terms of Metro Network?
options: 3rd
4th
5th
2nd
1st

quiz.text: ‘Citizen Engagement and Communication Programme’, which aims for grassroots penetration of all schemes so that governance is improved in all aspects, has recently (Nov 2022) been launched by which of the following state governments?
options: Assam
Goa
Gujarat
Meghalaya
Punjab

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the first-ever National Conference of PwD (Person with Disability) Icons for Accessible Elections has been organized by the Election Commission of India (ECI) in New Delhi. On the occasion, election commissioners launched the PwD App 2.0 and a Training Module to sensitize election personnel towards which of the following categories of people?
options: PwDs and Senior Citizens
PwDs and Women
PwDs and Manual Scavengers
PwDs and Transgenders
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), India has hosted for the first time the special meeting of the United Nations Security Council’s Counter Terrorism Committee (CTC) at Mumbai & New Delhi. Who among the following is serving as the Chair of the CTC for 2022?
options: External Affairs Minister of India
Permanent Representative of India to the UN
National Security Advisor of India
Prime Minister of India
President of UN Security Council

quiz.text: During the plenary session of the UNSC special meeting of the Counter Terrorism Committee (CTC), External Affairs Minister of India announced that India will contribute _______________ to the United Nations Trust Fund for Counter Terrorism this year.
options: USD 1 million
USD 2 million
USD 100,000
USD 500,000
USD 1.5 million

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances & Pensions announced a Nationwide Campaign for Submission of Digital Life Certificates and use of face authentication app by Pensioners. Every year, pensioners have to submit their Life Certificates in the month of ___________ to ensure continuity of their pension.
options: April
March
November
January
December

quiz.text: _______________was launched in 2015, for retiring government officials to leave a record of their experiences while in government service.
options: Kartavaya Portal
Anubhav Portal
Alekh Portal
Abhilekh Portal
Kirtiman Portal

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Prime Minister of India has urged the citizens to visit Nadabet and other border areas as part of Seema darshan project to encourage tourism. Seema Darshan Project was launched by which of the following states department?
options: Haryana State Tourism Department
Rajasthan State Tourism Department
Uttarakhand State Tourism Department
Punjab State Tourism Department
Gujarat State Tourism Department

quiz.text: Trade deficit between India and South Korea has been valued at which of the following  amounts (favor of South Korea) in 2021-22?
options: $6.5 billion
$2.5 billion
$9.5 billion
$12.5 billion
$5.5 billion

quiz.text: India-Republic of Korea (ROK) Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement (CEPA) was signed in which of the following years?
options: 2007
2009
2012
2013
2004
